content: to last 3 knit one round even stitches k2tog k1 on needle b k1 ssk and knit to last 3 stitches k2tog repeat until 12 stitches are left and k1 graft them together weave in all your ends block as desire chart is read from right to left bottom up the dark boxes indicate no stitch meaning there is no stitch to work simply skip past that box onto the next stitch abbreviations co cast on k - knit k1tbl - knit 1 through back loop k2tog knit 2 stitches together p - purl pm place stitch marker p2tog purl 2 stitches together sl -slip purlwise ssk slip slip knit sl slip pattern & photography by olivia villarreal
